name: Hive Token
description: Hive Token is a decentralized digital asset built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) that emphasizes transparency, honesty, and community-first values. Its design focuses on long-term sustainability through a deflationary token model with built-in burn mechanisms, while also supporting liquidity growth and ecosystem utility. The project aims to create a fair and trustworthy DeFi environment by: Implementing a 3% buy and sell tax where 1% is automatically burned, reducing supply over time, and 2% is reserved in the contract for future liquidity and development. Maintaining clear, trackable transactions on-chain to ensure transparency for all participants. Providing additional utility through staking options, on-chain games, and community-driven initiatives that increase engagement and expand token use cases.
